generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a turn arrow, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk visible on the right side of the image, where motorcycles are parked.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background and on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and some greenery are visible along the street and in front of the buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, showing red and green lights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular yield sign and a circular "30 Zone" sign.
- motorcycle: Motorcycles are parked on the right side of the road.
- car: A yellow car is visible in the middle of the street, behind the sidewalk.
